name: Opposition Counterspell
body:
**Archetype**: Thassilonian specialist
**Prerequisites**: Opposition Study, Counterspell, Quick Recognition

You have studied how to counter spells from your opposition school. Choose one of your opposition schools. Instead of just countering spells with the exact same spell, you can counter a spell from the chosen opposition school using any spell from your arcane school.
Whenever you cast an arcane spell from your opposition school (including from a scroll, wand or staff), you must succeed a flat DC 19 check or the spell has no effect.
